column5: Planning a trip to Halfway Lake PP next month. Does anyone have any tips on this lake, or any in the immediate area? It will be canoe fishing, so cant do too far out
I went camping there once a long time ago. Pretty area, the fishing was not great. I think we caught once big bass and that was it.
Thanks. We went a few years back. Caught a few small pike on Raven lake but nothing landed on the main lake
If you have a small boat i would go into Bailey Lake at the far end of halfway lake you need to portage into it  and its not a far portage.Walleye/Pike/Bass
